subject: Re: SeaSprout Website
preview: This was already moved to ClickUp task - https://app.clickup.com/t/86cyxzxdp. Will close this ticket now.

full_threads.body: This was already moved to ClickUp task - https://app.clickup.com/t/86cyxzxdp. Will close this ticket now.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Craig.

No problem at all—apologies for any confusion.

I've gone ahead and reviewed the project proposal.

I just wanted to clarify which pages you'd like to go through the design process.

Pages like Contact and Gallery might not require full design and could be developed directly.

Also, to ensure we're aligned on the direction, it would be great to get a bit more context on the content for the pages I listed in my previous email.

This will help us accurately reflect your vision in the design.

Hi Cindy,

Apologies for the delay.

Just to confirm, this is an outstanding website design yet to be finished, therefore we are still in the existing design phase. I don't envisage a proposal or additional costs.

It may be worth jumping on a call to go through the changes in more detail.

Images were shared in my previous email via a link.

Thanks,

Craig Walker
Owner

0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au

www.seasprout.com.au

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Craig,

Just circling back to see if you had a chance to review my previous email regarding the pending pages for SeaSprout.

Also, I wanted to let you know that we’ve completed the templates for the Our Stories archive and single pages:
  • Archive page: https://seasprout.com.au/stories/
  • Sample single page: https://seasprout.com.au/seasprout-launches-new-online-ordering-platform-dining-just-got-easier-2/

Additionally, upon reviewing the proposal we sent, I noticed that setting up Google Analytics and Google My Business was included in the scope.

To get started, could you please add the following emails to the respective platforms?
  • Google Analytics: analytics@wolfiq.com.au
  • Google Business Profile: team@smartreviews.com.au

Looking forward to your response so we can keep the project moving forward.

Hi Craig.

Here are the pages that are not yet developed/pending for content:
  • Menus
    • Café Menu - currently in private. Let me know if we shall include this on update or just publish the pagae
    • Restaurant Menu - same with cafe page
    • Drinks Menu
  • Offers Page - non existing
  • Book a Table
  • Our Owners
  • About Us
    • Careers
    • Gallery
  • Accessibility - this is a draft page
  • Catering
  • Contact - please let me know what fields are needed so we can create a form.
  • Privacy Policy and T&C - both pages are on draft as well.

Could you please list the pages we're currently drafting for design? I believe some pages, like the Contact and Gallery pages, may be ready for direct development.

Also, if possible, please share the content and any stock images we’ll be using.

Once everything is confirmed, I’ll coordinate with Andy to finalize the proposal for the pages that need design work.

full_threads.body: This ticket has been open for over 5 days. If action is still required, please prioritize it. Otherwise, kindly provide an update - either to confirm it can be closed or if a follow-up with the client is needed.

Hi Cindy,

As part of this update/finalisation of the website design, we need to complete any missing pages, both design and content.
Can you complete the design of any missing pages for my approval and confirm what content you need me to provide for each page.
Let's not provide active links to pages not finalised yet, but the hope is these will be complete within the next week or so.

Thanks

Craig Walker

M: 0423 784 301
E: craig@seasprout.com.au
W: www.seasprout.com.au

Hello Craig.

Just giving you a quick update — we’re currently working on the website requests!

I did want to clarify something: we're in the process of adding the new menus, but the pages they link to are currently empty/not finalized. Would you prefer that we redirect users to those pages, or should we just add blank links for now until the content is ready?

Example pages:
  • Gallery
  • Careers
  • Menu
    • Cafe - currently set to private
    • Restaurant - currently set to private
    • Drinks
Task added here and assigned to @glen : SS - Updates on the layout

@cindy - as this is related to an recently completed new website, we could pull this out into custom dev and pass to Whil?

Leaving with you to decide thumbs👍
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

action.text: Daphne Bautista assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Thanks Craig.

Our team will take care of these and confirm later this week.

Thank you

Hi Heath, Joel, Andy,

Please see below list and attached mark-ups of website design comments. I'm hoping we can get these incorporated as soon as possible.


Here is a link to images to use - https://1drv.ms/f/c/6b74d9fdedb776a1/EtvO1RgJTd9Glgk2rFr08dIBDmHUKVLJk8nEohyYNa7T6Q?e=DG8Fkw
Images are high res so you can crop them how you need to.

Home Page


  1. Update Menu
    Menu items to be Home / About / Menu / Loyalty / News
    About - About Landing Page, Careers Page, Gallary Page

Menus - Café Menu Page, Restaurant Menu Page, Drinks Menu Page
Loyalty - Loyalty Program Page, Gift Cards Page
News - Latest News Page, Offers Page

  1. 5 Home Images
    Show a mixture of café food, restaurant food & restaurant vibe.
  2. Café/Restaurant/Catering sections
    Remove Catering, Split the space 50/50 with Café and Restaurant.
    Change these so they show 3 rotating images each, instead of 1 static image.
  3. Loyalty Program
    Change to "SeaSprout Loyalty Program".
    Change image.
    Make the image clickable to the Loyalty Program sign-up page.
    Description: Join our loyalty program and earn points for every dollar spent at SeaSprout Café and Restaurant. Redeem points effortlessly day or night-whether it's your morning coffee, brunch, or dinner. Sign up today and turn every visit into delicious rewards!
  4. Our Owners
     Image to change but not yet available.
    Make the image clickable to "About" page
    Description: As owners of SeaSprout, we're passionate about creating a warm and welcoming experience for every guest. By day, we serve wholesome food and great coffee; by night, vibrant shared plates inspired by Mediterranean and coastal flavours-all in a relaxed, community-focused space.
  5. Gift Cards
    Update Image
    Make the Image clickable to "Gift Cards" Page.
    Description: Give the gift of great food and good vibes! Digital SeaSprout Café & Restaurant gift cards are available now
  6. Google Reviews
    Update link to SeaSprout Café & Restaurant google reviews. They are currently looking at Little Collins google reviews.
    • Add the AGFG badge to the footer

<a href="https://www.agfg.com.au/restaurant/seasprout-cafe-restaurant-freshwater-138640" title="SeaSprout Cafe & Restaurant Freshwater"><img src="https://media1.agfg.com.au/images/links/write-review-sq-140x80.png" alt="SeaSprout Cafe & Restaurant Freshwater" style="border:none;" /></a>

  1. Home Page Footer
    Refer to attached mark-up.

I'll get more comments to you on the other pages soon.

Thanks,


Craig Walker
Owner
0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au
www.seasprout.com.au
